text: Since I changed my expectations for this game, I'm more excited to simply play a new IGAvania. I always thought it looked like a safe by-the-book game from IGA and it seems to be the case from the impressions I've read, but is that really a bad thing? We have plenty of other amazing Metroidvanias now, so I'll choose to see this game as a nice comfort food experience, classic Yamane music included. I'll post my thoughts once I actually play through it!
author: SupraDarky

text:
"Forgotten" Jade.... You're right title: unmemorable melody, but actually pretty smooth to hear.
I was hoping for the game's ost to maybe convince me to buy it, but, hey, there are games for everyones down here, so does music.

SupraDarky, your music tastes are broad (and often good at my point of view), even when the music doesn't actually fit my hearing, so keep up this good vgm list.
Did you tried some Chipzel's musics ? (Super Hexagon, The Crypt of the NecroDancer)
